entry.title: The First Brick
entry.summary:
This is my first post on this blog. I've created it for several reasons. First and foremost, I have made the decision to jump into several types of web development. My current means of enployment does not faciliate any flexing of my artistic muscle. I like producing things and web development seems like a way to accomplish this.

Why Build this Incredible Empire ?

This blog, created utilizing Pelican, is my first forray into the wild web. My second will be some WordPress development and after that hopefully a little web application creation. I intend to chronicle that venture here. Hopefully I can record my process and possibly help others in their venture or leave something that will assist aliens in learning about out culture.

Secondly, I like writing and I need a place that I can put words on paper without damaging my future political career. I don't intend on distrubuting this really widely or editing it very well. Hopefully anyone that reads it will find me mildly literate.

Next Stop! Tech-Moguldom!!
